body.name: REDTIGER Dash Cam Front Rear, 4K/2.5K Full HD Dash Camera for Cars, Free 32GB Card, Built-in Wi-Fi GPS, 3.16” IPS Screen, Night Vision, 170°Wide Angle, WDR, 24H Parking Mode
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 45 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 45 mins
features: 4K+1080P DUAL RECORDING- REDTIGER brings to you F7NP dual dash cam which records video of up to Ultra HD 4K(3840*2160P)+FHD 1080P resolutions. It helps you to read the key details like road signs, vehicle number plates etc. To reduce the blind areas it has the front wide angle of 170 degree and rear wide angle of 140 degree. This helps you during unexpected circumstances like collision to retain and present evidence.

SUPERIOR NIGHT VISION- The driving recorder adopts an excellent optical lens with an ultra-large F1.5 aperture and 6 layers, and is equipped with HDR/WDR technology to capture important details clearly under low light conditions.

WiFi/SMART APP CONTROL- You just need to connect the dash cam to you smartphone APP via WiFi and then you can use the "Redtiger" app to view, playback, and manage the dash cam on your IOS or Android devices. You can also download and edit videos in the app. By just one-click you can share your travel scenery and wonderful moments with your friends and family.

DASH CAM WITH GPS- This dash cam has a built-in GPS and records the driving route, real-time speed, location, etc. You can track on google maps via WiFi using the App or with our Windows and Mac GPSPlayer, which will provide further additional evidence if an accident occurs.

RELIABLE FEATURES FOR ACCIDENT RECORDING- Even when the card is full the dash cam will continue recording with its Loop Recording feature. As soon as the G sensor detects a sudden collision, it locks and saves the collision video. It also has a 24 hours parking monitor available on the dash cam to record continuously for 24 hours with time lapse function at parking mode. Please note that a hardware kit is needed.

SUPER AFTERSALES-Our greatest pursuit is to satisfy the needs of consumers. This dash cam is backed by full 1-YEAR WARRANTY and 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.Email our customer service and we will answer any of your questions/concerns.We offer 7*24 hours technical support.

Time-lapse 24/48H Monitor The dash cam captures and records footage at 1fps per second to conserve memory, allowing for continuous surveillance of a parked vehicle.Hardwire kit is needed.(ASIN:B092Z6GN96) G-sensor Parking Monitor The dash cam will automatically record a 10-second video and lock it up when certain emergency occurs.Peace of Mind When You Leave Your Vehicle.Hardwire kit is needed.(ASIN:B092Z6GN96)
Previous page Next page 1 What‘s in the box？ 2 Easy Installation

How does built-in wifi work? How do I connect dash cam to my phone? Download the exclusive app REDTIGER, turn on dash cam wifi, then connect it. You can refer to the instruction manual where detailed operating steps are described, if you still have questions, please just contact the 24/7 Redtiger support team. I want to use the parking monitoring function, do I have to buy a separate hardwire kit? Yes,the hardwire kit(ASIN:B092Z6GN96) enables dashcams parking monitoring mode and protects the Car battery from being depleted. The hardwire kit is not Included, you need to purchase it separately. I lost the dash cam accessories during use, can I buy them separately? Redtiger sells single accessory in the store, including F7N rear camera extension cable 33FT(B0956V2GM1), 128GB card(B0BBRN2ZZN), exterior rear camera(B09V7QQ12H), suction cup bracket(B09LLFHCRJ), 3M bracket(B09SFY13TZ) and so on. Do I need to buy Memory card to use this dash cam?what size memory card is recommended? This dash cam supports memory card of 32GB-256GB. A free 32GB card is included in the package. U3 Class 10 memory card is recommended if you need to buy a new one, or just purchase Redtiger in-store 128GB card which is the most fit. I don't know how to install dash camera and is this dash cam war-ranty one year ? RedTiger manuals and videos provide detailed usage and installation details, if you have any more questions , please contact RedTiger directly. This dash cam is backed by full 1-YEAR WAR-RANTY and 100% Satis-faction Gua-rantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seamless Blend of Exceptional Customer Service and Cutting-Edge Dashboard Camera Technology: F7N
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased 2 dashboard cameras from REDTIGER. First in April 2021, and the second in April 2023. Unfortunately, the second camera failed after just 3 months. It begin to reboot at random time, making all sorts of noses.NOTE: the original review as negative (I give REDTIGER only one star). I decided to change this review from negative to POSITIVE after resolving the problem with the REDTIGER customer support.If you have a problem with REDTIGER's Dashboard camera, I highly encourage you to contact REDTIGER and work with them!From the moment I reached out to the REDTIGER customer service team, I was met with a level of professionalism and attentiveness that is increasingly rare in today's fast-paced world. The representatives were not only knowledgeable about their product but also genuinely committed to ensuring a smooth and satisfying customer experience. They patiently addressed all my inquiries, providing detailed information and guidance that went above and beyond my expectations.Now, let's talk about the star of the show—the new dashboard camera F7N. The device boasts cutting-edge technology that sets it apart from the competition. The video quality is nothing short of exceptional, capturing crystal-clear footage both during the day and at night. The wide-angle lens ensures a comprehensive view of the surroundings, leaving no room for blind spots.What truly impressed me was the camera's advanced features (touch screen) and user-friendly interface.One standout feature is the intelligent parking mode, which automatically activates the camera when motion is detected, providing an added layer of security for my vehicle. The device's reliability and robust construction instill confidence, and its sleek design adds a touch of modernity to my car's interior.In conclusion, the exceptional customer service combined with the top-tier performance of this dashboard camera has left me thoroughly impressed. It's evident that the company not only prioritizes innovation but also values its customers' satisfaction. If you're in the market for a reliable and high-performing dashboard camera, look no further - F7N is an excellent camera supported by excellent customer service at REDTIGER

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, Ease, and Exceptional Service
reviews.reviewText: I did extensive research on dashcams, I ultimately decided on the REDTIGER F7NP, a decision that I've been happy with for over a year now. This camera has consistently impressed me with its high-quality performance. The clarity of both its standard imaging and night vision capabilities stands out, providing crisp and clear visuals regardless of the lighting conditions.It is quite easy to install, and you just forget about it while it does its job, then it is there when you truly need it. Reviewing the footage is very friendly, either through the camera, the SD reader or on the phone through the app. They upgraded their app not too long ago and it is very nice to use and work like a charm.The customer service provided by REDTIGER is deserving of special commendation. Their support team truly shines. I encountered some issues when using large capacity SD cards with the camera. I teached out to them via email, I was met with prompt and attentive responses through every email exchange until my issue was resolved. Their dedication to customer satisfaction is genuinely commendable.All in all, this is a great buy and then some, and I am very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Dashcam. Fabulous Customer Service! Insufficient Parking Mode Instructions (read below).
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my wife's RAV4. I like having both the front and rear cameras and love how compact they are; they are fairly unobtrusive in both locations. The front camera is mostly behind the rear-view mirror (the camera is small enough to easily fit entirely behind the mirror, but the car's OEM black box against the windshield is already occupying the ideal real estate). The rear camera is tucked up at the top of the rear window (just at the top of the rear wiper sweep area) and is barely noticeable. I liked that I could rotate the rear camera in its holder to the view angle I wanted. The cable length on the rear camera was more than sufficient to reach front-to-back in this car (and easily tucked away behind the headliner and other trim pieces), but I'm not sure if it would be enough for a full-size SUV like an Excursion. It does have an inline connector near the rear camera which was convenient when installing the rear camera and running the wire and may allow for an extension to be used.The video quality looks great. I set my front resolution down to 1080p since I feel that will be sufficient for our day-to-day needs. In my opinion, the quality of the footage will be impacted more by how clean the glass is and the weather conditions outside than the quality of the cameras.I like that I can set whether and how long the screen is visible when the dashcam is on. Most of the time, I prefer to have the displays screen off. It takes some clicking to get through all of the menus, but I found the UI intuitive and easy enough to use.The included lighter adaptor worked fine, but I got the hardwire kit (https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09WCTZ3Y8?ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details&th=1) to run permanently and to enable Parking Mode (see note below).I also got the 3M Mount (https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09SFY13TZ?psc=1&ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details) so I could mount the camera a bit higher behind the rear-view mirror. I'll use the suction mount and lighter adaptor when using the dashcam on trips in a rental car.You'll want to get a larger (e.g. 256 GB) High Endurance U3 SD card (https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07P4HBRMV?psc=1&ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details) as the included SD card is only U1.NOTE on the hardwire kit and Parking Mode: I connected the wires as instructed (yellow->BATT, red->ACC, black->GRD) but did not see the behavior I was expecting from the dashcam: the dashcam immediately turned on even though the ACC power was off, and I could not turn on Parking Mode. This led me to believe that the documentation was wrong, so I reversed the red and yellow wires which resulted in the dashcam not turning on until ACC power was on and allowing me to set Parking Mode (or so I thought), so I felt that I had figured it out. However, I then realized that the dashcam would not stay on - it never recorded any footage while the car was on (or off). Gratefully, I found a Q&A response from "Elizabeth B" back on 10/7/2021 which explained how to properly set up Parking Mode (which doesn't appear to be documented anywhere with either product):1. Connect wires as described above (Yellow = constant 12v, Red = switched 12v, Black = ground).2. Turn on acc power (but do not start engine).3. Press menu button and select "Parking".4. While blue message box is shown on the F7N display, turn off acc power (this has to be timed well). You should see a new blue message box and the F7N unit will power off.5. Turn acc power back on (but do not start engine).6. Press menu button and select "Parking".7. You will now see the menu options for Parking Mode and be able to configure it how you like.credit: Elizabeth B.(Attention REDTIGER: You should include these steps in your documentation and compensate Elizabeth.)After reverting my wire connections back to match the documentation and following the steps above, my hardwired dashcam is now functioning perfectly - including Parking Mode.Even though my installation and set-up experience with the hardwire kit wasn't ideal, I do have to say that the REDTIGER customer service was outstanding! They were responsive, proactive, and empowered to do the right things for their customers. Thank you Nora!As for the apps, the Android app seems to work sufficiently well. It does take a LONG time to download the video files over the dashcam's wi-fi. I prefer to remove the SD card and copy the files directly to my PC.I'm not very impressed with the PC app (Windows 10) yet. I tried it only once, but it seemed to have a hard time after viewing the first video, and even that wasn't great. It's intended to show both front & rear video simultaneously, which I think is great, but I haven't been able to get it work very well. I'll try again and see if I can get it run better. I was surprised to discover that the rear camera records audio, so it doesn't sound great when both front and rear audio are played at the same time. I muted the rear audio and used just the front audio.The video files run just fine on third-part video players.Bottom line: I love the dashcam and rear camera; easy to use; good video; absolutely fabulous customer service.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good for the price, but even better customer service
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cam sometime in July. I was having troubles with the suction cup in high and low temps so I bought the adhesive one. I haven’t had any issues with it coming off.The picture is better than low quality cams and for the price, it is good. You should have no issues seeing the license plates of cars beside you when it’s light out. The night vision should allow you to clearly see the license plate of a vehicle in front of you. There was no issues with setting it up and mounting it to my car. I haven’t done the rear facing cam yet though.Since I haven’t used the suction cup in a while, I lost it and I needed to use it for my work van. I can’t put an adhesive mount on since the vehicle isn’t mine. When I first messaged customer service asking them to help me, I was fully expecting to pay for it and shipping if that was even possible since they don’t ship to Canada and Amazon.ca doesn’t sell a replacement mount. I never imagined this would be solved so quickly, but least of all that I’d get it for free just because I lost the other one. Thank you so much Crystal. You did an amazing job helping me and you really deserve a raise!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Great camera, great quality and very useful
reviews.reviewText: This camera is amazing... I was going to say amazing for the price, but I'll just say it's generally pretty regardless of price point. The video quality is fantastic and high resolution, with audio recording included as well as that could be useful in some circumstances. It was very easy to install, but that will of course vary by car depending on if you have somewhere throughout the car where the cables can be hidden, and the cables are a great length... I have quite a big car and had a lot of cable left over, so don't worry at all if that is your concern.The accompanying software to view your clips is also great and you can search by date, time and location as the cameras clip on mount contains a GPS like device, so you can see were you were on the map depending on what clip you were playing. It's super easy to take off the amount and retrieve the footage if you need to do so.This camera has already saved me from a not fault claim, as well as prove in fault claim that the actions/damaged I caused were in no way as they claimed (they tried bundling existing damaged on the claim to avoid having to pay for it themselves). However due to the great video quality during the day and night, the insurance took their claims forward to be fraudulent. Would 100% recommend!!!!
Lo mejor que ai.Calidad del producto,vuen precio,envío rapido

Dies ist meine erste Dashcam,habe aber Wochen damit verbracht zu vergleichen welche ich möchte.Es sollte eine mit Gps,dual camera und mindestens 1440p sein....und natürlich kein vermögen kosten.Die Kamera von Redtiger kam dann durch YouTube in meinen engeren Auswahlkreis.Installation super einfach,Kabel absolut ausreichend lang genug (fahre einen Astra K sports tourer).Kamera fühlt sich wertig und stabil an,Aufnahmen sehen Klasse aus (ich nutze 1440p mit 60fps. 4k geht mit 30 FPS .)Auch nachts Klasse Aufnahmen,Kennzeichen sind super zu erkennen.Nach dem Kauf kam sehr schnell eine Nachricht von Verkäufer,es wurde gefragt ob ich noch etwas benötige wie klebepads o.ä.Die Smartphone App ist mega,wenn man sich das Video ansieht,ob nun auf der Kamera oder wenn man es z b per App auf das Handy lädt,sieht man das Video Bild und darunter eine map mit der Position und Geschwindigkeit.Bei 5 Minuten Aufnahmen werden die Dateien etwas größer als 500mb daher dauert das runterladen aufs Handy dann ein klein wenig,aber ich nutze die Zeit um nach der Kurzstrecke die mein Auto leider oft bekommt den Motor noch ein wenig warm laufen zu lassen * ja ich weiß,mimimi Umwelt ...aber ein kaputter Motor stößt noch mehr Schadstoff aus *Fotos hänge ich hier nicht an,draußen ist's schon dunkel und im Internet gibt es schon so viel dazu....guckt euch am besten Videos zu der Kamera auf YouTube an.Ich habe das hardwire Kit zwar schon hier aber noch nicht verbaut ( dies wird für den Parkmodus benötigt)Das normale Kabel für den Zigarettenanzünder hat einen USB Port dran so dass man daran dann z.b noch sein Smartphone laden kann.So,ich denke ich hab alles gesagt xDFazit : kauft das Teil,lohnt sich definitiv. Und wenn was ist,ich denke der Support ist einsame Spitze und wird das schon regeln.
